column2: Select objects with the select material in the list

column1: 在使用场景分析工具之前，存储场景中每个物体的原始颜色。(如果启用，可能会影响使用该工具时的性能，只有在你需要这个功能时才启用它）。
column2: Store the original color of each object in the scene before using the Scene Analyzer Tool. (If enabled, may impact in performance when using the tool, enable it only if you need this feature)

column1: 将修改器包含在顶点计数中
在默认情况下，Blender对象数据不会存储未应用修改器的顶点。启用该选项后，插件将使用另一种方法来获取带有修改器的对象的顶点数量。(如果启用，可能会影响使用工具时的性能，只有在你需要这个功能时才启用它）
column2: By Default, Blender Object Data does not stores vertices with non-applied modifiers. By Enabling this option, the addon will use another method to get vertice count of objects with modifiers. (If enabled, may impact in performance when using the tool, enable it only if you need this feature)

column1: 必要时自动切换控制台
在任何长的过程开始之前，如图像调整或场景基准测试，控制台将被切换，你将能够看到进度。
column2: The console will be toggled before any long process starts such as Image Resizing or Scene Benchmarks, and you will be able to see the progress

column1: 基准测试前自动保存文件
文件总是需要被保存，以便在基准测试过程中能够访问所有的材料。
column2: The file always need to be saved for all materials be accessible in the benchmark process

column1: 如果启用，该插件将在同一混合文件目录下创建一个文件夹，所有带有链接对象的混合文件都将放在那里。
column2: If enabled, the addon will crate a folder in the same blend file directory, and all blend files with linked objects will be placed there

column2: If enabled, after linked the object will be made local, meaning the you will be able to move it, if you don
